A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I liked the movie but there were some major issues that made me unhappy after watching.
1. Luke's character deserved better. 
2. Why no training scene for Rey? Apparently she can turn ninja and control the force with no effort with zero real training. 
3. There was a build up of who was Rey's parents and then they end up being bunkers. What a let down. 
4. There was a build up of who Snoke was and then they just kill him off so easily and offer ZERO explanation of who he is. 
5. Most females are seen as smarter than men and most male characters are stupid\, goofy fools. Way to alienate for no reason. 

So all in all I was disappointed after waiting 2 years and I won't  get over excited for the next one. May even wait until it comes out on Netflix.
